title: Program to Strengthen Mathematical Practical Competencies through Inter-College Program Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Teams composed of university students from diverse majors (engineering, business, education, etc.) perform practical problem-solving simulations.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to apply mathematical theories to real-world tasks (e.g., data analysis, budget estimation) through simulations.
Learners can compare and evaluate mathematical problem-solving strategies from diverse academic perspectives through peer collaboration.
Learners systematically analyze their problem-solving processes by writing reflective journals in VR-based case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
